tprstats.hypothesis_test
========================

.. py:module:: tprstats.hypothesis_test




Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: test_population_mean(data, popmean, alpha=0.05)

   Test of a null hypothesis about a sample mean.
   :param data: Data
   :param popmean: Population Mean
   :type popmean: float
   :param alpha: Significance Level. Defaults to 0.05.
   :type alpha: float, optional

   :returns: Returns the t-statistic, p_value, confidence interval and sample.
   :rtype: pandas.Series
